mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dept SET flag = #{flag}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE deptId = #{deptId}

UPDATE sys_dept SET deptName = #{deptName}, address = #{address}, contact = #{contact}, contactNumber = #{contactNumber}, principal = #{principal}, principalNumber = #{principalNumber}, productType = #{productType}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE deptId = #{deptId}
mapper.select: SELECT deptId, deptNo, deptName, sd.levelId, sdl.levelName, sd.areaId, sa.areaName, sd.pId, address, contact, contactNumber, principal, principalNumber, sd.createDate, productType, GROUP_CONCAT(pt.typeName) AS typeName FROM sys_dept sd LEFT JOIN sys_dept_level sdl ON sd.levelId = sdl.levelId LEFT JOIN sys_area sa ON sd.areaId = sa.areaId LEFT JOIN product_type pt ON sd.productType & pt.typeId > 0 WHERE deptId = #{deptId} GROUP BY deptId
